column4: Anywho... does anyone have advice about switching from windows to linux? I'm doing it... and the biggest problem i'm having is not being able to access the net.
/msg me and I'll give you lots of info.
You need to do /msg TheBlue and then your message.
GAIM isn't the best for IRC. But its all I've got.
Please tell me its not AOHell.
Or any of those fun things?
Running w2k sp4... 8th reformat so far... my HD keeps on failing.
